title: Noam Chomsky on Propaganda, War, Fascism, Free Speech, and the Future | Minority Views Podcast #6
description:
Noam Chomsky joins the Minority Views Podcast with Omer Aziz to discuss free speech, authoritarianism, China, Israel, climate change, and other issues. 

Minority Views is the podcast from Omer Aziz, Radcliffe Fellow at Harvard and author of "Brown Boy: A Memoir." 

More about Omer's book: https://www.simonandschuster.com/books/Brown-Boy/Omer-Aziz/9781982136314 

More about Omer's research at Harvard: https://www.radcliffe.harvard.edu/people/omer-aziz
